about_the_game:
You are the first one to set your feet in these Lost Lands. It is time to build, explore and discover! The wondrous new world holds a lot of mysteries, and you get to be the one to uncover them.

Spiritual successor to Lost Settlers, Lost Lands develops the ideas from the original further. More to build, more to explore and more to find!

Lost Lands is minimalistic. One tile - one building. Or a forest. Or a mountain. Or… well, a lot of other stuff.

You start with a lonely bonfire and a lot of unexplored lands around you. Uncover the tiles around to discover new places to build, supplies to gather, ruins to explore and more! There are many ways to interact with the world, and there are no wrong ways of doing it.

Each building in Lost Lands has a function and many open up new ways to interact with the tiles. Build a lumberjacks shack - now you can chop down the forest tiles for wood. On the other hand, a forager's hut unlocks the ability to pick up those yummy-looking mushrooms that could now be a healthy snack! As you expand, so does your toolbelt!

As days and nights go by, so will the seasons, each bringing about changes to your town and the surroundings. Each season also comes with its own set of normal, and sometimes bizarre weather conditions. The world reacts to all of these effects, some plants loving the rainy weather of fall, while others thrive during the rough summer droughts. Prepare for the harsh winter, and use the conditions to your advantage!

There is nothing to worry about. You cannot lose the game. Grab hot cocoa, wrap yourself in the blanket, relax, and enjoy the process.

short_description: Build. Explore. Discover. Lost Lands is a minimalistic, chill city builder inspired by Nordic tales and landscape. Lead the growth of your settlement by exploring the mysterious lands around, mastering ancient magic and building a happy place of your own.
